title: How Biden plans to squeeze Putin's global access to high tech - POLITICO
content:
1. How Biden plans to squeeze Putin's global access to high tech  POLITICO
  2. Biden hits Russia with tough export curbs, slashing access to global tech  Reuters
  3. US sanctions on Russia affect defence, tech, finance  Al Jazeera English
  4. U.S. announces sweeping restrictions on technological exports to Russia.  The New York Times
  5. Biden's new sanctions against Russia: Blocking more banks and cutting off tech imports, but no SWIFT move  MarketWatch
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Export controls announced Thursday are designed to undermine Russia's defense, maritime and aerospace industries, the president said.
